title: Social Media / Content Manager (Part-Time)
job_overview:
???? HIRING: Social Media / Content Manager (Part-Time, Remote, Philippines)
???? 20 hours per week | Long-term | Work-from-home

We’re a digital marketing agency in Australia looking for a sharp, proactive Social Media / Content Manager to help handle our clients’ online presence.

? What you’ll do:

Plan and schedule posts across Facebook & Instagram

Write engaging captions & research relevant hashtags

Reply to comments & DMs in a friendly, professional tone

Stay updated on local trends, competitor pages & new features

Set up and track simple boosted posts / ad campaigns

Report on engagement & growth monthly

???? Who we’re looking for:

Strong written English (friendly, witty, professional)

Social media savvy — knows reels, carousels, trends, Upgrade to see actual infos

Experience with Canva, Facebook Creator Studio, Meta Business Suite

Proactive — can take a brief and run with it

Organised with content calendars & schedules

???? Perks:

Long-term role with stable hours (20/week)

Chance to grow into a full-time position or team lead

Friendly, supportive team — we want you to shine

???? To apply:
Send us:

A quick intro video (30 sec, can be casual!)

Examples of pages you’ve managed or content you’ve written

Your expected monthly rate for 20 hours/week
